attributes.action: Give Christmas Day and Boxing Day bank Hollidays back in the summer 2021.
attributes.additional_details: People’s well being, and the feeling that you have missed out on two bank Hollidays over a very special time
attributes.background:
I would like as a one off, for the government to give two days bank Holliday in summer 2021,
So that people can celebrate the loss of loved ones and the loss of previous family time over this dreadful period. If people have something to look forward to would take the pressure off what is happening.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

Create extra bank holidays to make up for those that took place under COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564471 

Make 26th & 27th July 2021 a one off Double Bank Holiday - Christmas in July: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561169

Christmas in July - 2 extra days off on Friday 23rd and Monday 26th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564171

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564183
